statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE appliance_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY appliance_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY appliance_name ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT appliance_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT appliance_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY appliance_name HAVING total_energy_consumed > 500
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE appliance_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT appliance_id, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliance_details WHERE energy_rating > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM appliance_details ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT appliance_id, SUM(energy_consumed) as total_energy FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE appliance_id = 1;

SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM appliance_details INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data ON appliance_details.appliance_id = energy_consumption_data.appliance_id WHERE appliance_details.manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT appliance_name, energy_rating FROM appliance_details WHERE energy_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY energy_rating DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliance_details WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS average_energy_consumed, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 100
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliance_info WHERE appliance_type = 'Smart Home'
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT appliance_name, prediction FROM energy_analysis WHERE optimization_strategy = 'Reduce Consumption'
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN appliance_info USING(appliance_id) WHERE appliance_type='Refrigerator'
SELECT MAX(energy_consumed) AS max_energy_consumed, MIN(energy_consumed) AS min_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data
SELECT appliance_name, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN appliance_info USING(appliance_id) GROUP BY appliance_name ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_analysis WHERE prediction > energy_consumed ORDER BY timestamp DESC, prediction ASC
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionLogs;
SELECT log_id, appliance_id, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer, appliance_type FROM SmartAppliances WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, log_id, analysis_timestamp, energy_saving_opportunity FROM EnergyConsumptionAnalysis WHERE analysis_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionOptimization ORDER BY optimization_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionLogs;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM SmartAppliances WHERE appliance_type = 'Refrigerator';
SELECT log_timestamp, energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumptionLogs WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT SmartAppliances.appliance_name, EnergyConsumptionLogs.log_timestamp FROM SmartAppliances JOIN EnergyConsumptionLogs ON SmartAppliances.appliance_id = EnergyConsumptionLogs.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionAnalysis WHERE analysis_timestamp BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM smart_appliances;
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_appliances;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_appliances ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, total_energy_consumed FROM smart_appliances JOIN appliance_stats ON smart_appliances.appliance_id = appliance_stats.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_appliances WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM smart_appliances ORDER BY appliance_name ASC
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name FROM smart_appliances WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC
SELECT appliance_name, energy_consumption FROM smart_appliances WHERE appliance_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM energy_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY energy_usage DESC

SELECT appliance_name, total_energy_consumed FROM appliance_stats INNER JOIN appliance_types ON appliance_stats.appliance_id = appliance_types.appliance_id WHERE appliance_types.appliance_type = 'Smart TV'
